name: Evil Plush Toy - Scary Nights
description:
Scary nights - separate you from the victory over the Evil Plush Toy!

Hogy - is a green monster that escaped from a toys store and is chasing you. Use strategic skills to escape from him.

Hogy terrorizes the villagers...
Only such a smart strategist like you can help the residents to resist the Hogy!

To resist the Hogy, you need to listen to where he makes a sound and be ready for defense.
Hold out for scary nights and the villagers will be saved!

Five nights separate you from the victory over the Hogy Green Monster!

Enjoy this Game!
